DOC.brief_summary: Polar lipid specific chemical structure : essential component human cell membrane , play major role nervous system also influence metabolic pathway include cholesterol metabolism . Polar lipid use food-processing industry emulsification property . The famous emulsifier soya lecithin milk also naturally contain natural emulsifier polar lipid . The purpose research study plasma cholesterol variation daily intake milk polar lipids-fortified cheese product . The volunteer consume 100 g cheese product four week instead usual cheese product . It bi-centric study centre LYON ( Centre de Recherche en Nutrition Humaine Rh√¥ne-Alpes ) CLERMONT-FERRAND ( Centre de Recherche en Nutrition Humaine Auvergne ) .
DOC.brief_title: Milk Polar Lipids Consumption , Lipid Metabolism , Inflammation Menopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Menopausal woman Of less 75 year old Body Mass Index 25 35 kg/m2 Waist circumference great 80 cm Normal ( clinically significant ) glycemic lipid parameter Dairy product allergy intolerance Smokers ( five cigarettes/day ) HDL cholesterol great 1.5 mmol/L Medication could interfere lipid metabolism intestinal microbiota ( example , antibiotic within 2 month study ) Hormone replacement treatment menopause
